alert.note: Alert for Columbia; Hamilton; Suwannee (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 06 at 7:32PM EDT until May 06 at 7:45PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 745 PM EDT FOR NORTHWESTERN COLUMBIA...NORTHEASTERN SUWANNEE AND SOUTHEASTERN HAMILTON COUNTIES... At 732 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near White Springs, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Live Oak, White Springs and Suwannee Valley. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EDT for northern Florida. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
